document.discussion_title: St. Patrick’s offers final resting place for $7M in crypt
document.topic_text: 0 Comment For sale: Long-term residence. Room for family of six. Prime Soho location with quiet neighbors. Must be dead. The Basilica of St. Patrick’s Old Cathedral plans to open its 200-year-old crypt to the public for the first time — selling a six-person family vault in the catacombs for $7 million. The boneyard is beneath the…
